DOC.brief_summary: The investigators would like to assess whether monovision correction of multifocal lens insertion provides more satisfaction to cataract patients following an uncomplicated phacoemulsification surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Monovision vs Multifocal Lens Insertion in Cataract Patients
DOC.criteria: Bilateral senile cataract Glaucoma Corneal pathology Fundus pathology Severe neurological/mental diseases that interfere with visual acuity Former intraocular operation
